News.Title: PAR Drugs and Chemicals Announces Major Business Restructuring
News.Summary: PAR Drugs and Chemicals has announced significant changes to its business structure. The company plans to diversify into real estate and construction, as well as venture into the capital market. Additionally, PAR Drugs and Chemicals will execute a slump sale of its existing establishment for 928.8 million rupees.

News.Title: PAR Drugs and Chemicals Approves Slump Sale and Shifts to Renewable Energy
News.Summary: PAR Drugs and Chemicals has approved a slump sale of its existing establishment. The company has also announced its intention to enter the clean, renewable energy business. This marks a significant shift in the company's focus and operations.

News.Title: PAR Drugs & Chemicals Schedules Board Meeting for Q2 Results
News.Summary: PAR Drugs & Chemicals has announced a board meeting scheduled for October 22 to consider and approve the company's financial results for the second quarter of the current fiscal year.
